name: R5-ChargeItemDefinition-R4B-ChargeItemDefinition
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 ChargeItemDefinition into FHIR R4B

element.display: Definition of properties and rules about how the price and the applicability of a ChargeItem can be determined

target.display: Definition of properties and rules about how the price and the applicability of a ChargeItem can be determined
target.comment: R5 `ChargeItemDefinition` maps as Equivalent to R4B `ChargeItemDefinition`

element.display: Whether or not the billing code is applicable

target.display: Whether or not the billing code is applicable
target.comment: R5 `ChargeItemDefinition.applicability` maps as Equivalent to R4B `ChargeItemDefinition.applicability`

element.display: Boolean-valued expression
When the charge item definition is expected to be used
Additional content defined by implementations

target.display: Additional content defined by implementations
target.comment: R5 `ChargeItemDefinition.applicability.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `ChargeItemDefinition.applicability.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `extension`

target.comment: R5 `ChargeItemDefinition.applicability.id` maps as Equivalent to R4B `ChargeItemDefinition.applicability.id`
